org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRGLTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRGLTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class OVRGLTexture
extends Struct
    Contains OpenGL-specific texture information.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  OVRGLTexture.Buffer
      An array of OVRGLTexture structs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OVRGLTexture

        public OVRGLTexture(long struct)
        Creates a OVRGLTexture instance at the specified memory address.

      • OVRGLTexture

        public OVRGLTexture(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a OVRGLTexture instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
